title: Realme’s latest affordable flagship — the Realme GT 2 — is now available in India
content:
After launching its flagship Realme GT 2 Pro in India earlier this month, Realme quietly launched the non-Pro variant in the region last week. The regular Realme GT 2 is a minor step down from the flagship model, and it will go on sale in the region starting today. The Realme GT 2 features Qualcomm’s

The post Realme’s latest affordable flagship — the Realme GT 2 — is now available in India appeared first on XDA.
description: The vanilla Realme GT 2 is now available for purchase in the Indian market at a starting price of ₹34,999 for the 8GB+128GB variant.
